Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have some problems with Tweakscale. I can scale the structures, but when I want to add a kerbal to the crew I can't do it because there is no place for the crew in the cabin.

What should I do?

I took a picture of the problem. You can see it here:  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-hlT9xqxpRnH8RSJ95rMj3Lsn-zL5qBA/view?usp=sharing

Had you scaled up or down?

If the part has only one crew position, and you scale it down, then there will be no space left for a Kerbal.
No, i didn't. But luckily I fixed the problem. I reinstalled the game and the mods, and now it's working.  But thank you for your help.

On 5/6/2022 at 4:43 PM, Robi_243 said:

No, i didn't. But luckily I fixed the problem. I reinstalled the game and the mods, and now it's working.  But thank you for your help.

WAIT! I got curious and tried to find a way to reproduce the issue. And I found it!!

If you downscale a Mark 1 Cockpit two notches, two things happens:

  1. If the part is crewed, the Kerbals go M.I.A.!!!! 
  2. Once you scale back the part, the crew capacity is not restored!!

I'm absolutely sure I had tested the Item 2 when I first released this feature - but don't remember if I had tested the item 1.

In a way or another, I have to work on this: https://github.com/net-lisias-ksp/TweakScale/issues/247

As a workaround for the problem 2, remove the part and attach a new one from the Palette. There's no workaround for the problem 1, however. I will see what I can do on this weekend.

— — POST EDIT — — 

Loading and saving the Craft is also an workaround for the problem 1.

— — POST POST EDIT — — 

It is fixed! Thanks for the report!

 

Edited May 8, 2022 by Lisias
